entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoria Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 6:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 39 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
